org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin7

Class ConvertedProperty<P,M>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.data.util.AbstractProperty<P>
      • org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin7.ConvertedProperty<P,M>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - the "presentation" type of this Property
    M - the "model" type of the nested Property
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Property<P>, Property.ReadOnlyStatusChangeNotifier, Property.ValueChangeNotifier, Serializable

    public class ConvertedProperty<P,M>
extends AbstractProperty<P>
    Applies a Converter to a Property of one type (the "model" type) to produce a Property of another type (the "presentation" type).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                 Converter<P,M> converter,

        Primary constructor.
        Parameters:
        property - underlying property
        converter - converts this property's values from/to the underlying property's values
        locale - the Locale to provide to converter, or null for none
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if type, property, or converter is null
